everyone.label: View User Avatar
everyone.description: See a larger version of this user's avatar

everyone.label: Flag Message/User
everyone.description: Bring this to the attention of the Moderators

everyone.label: Pin Message
everyone.description: Request a message pin (or pin it if you're in Team)

mod.label: Crospost to Mod Discussion
mod.description: Discuss this message in the Mod Discussion channel

mod.label: Get User Summary
mod.description: Get info on a user and all their infractions

mod.label: Note User
mod.description: Make a moderation note about this user or message

mod.label: Rename User
mod.description: Assign this user a new nickname

mod.label: Trust User
mod.description: Give this user the Trusted role

mod.label: Un-Trust User
mod.description: Take the Trusted role from this user

mod.label: Trust+ User
mod.description: Give this user the Trusted+ role

mod.label: Un-Trust+ User
mod.description: Take the Trusted+ role from this user

mod.label: Watch User
mod.description: Add this user to the watchlist

mod.label: Unwatch User
mod.description: Remove this user from the watchlist

mod.label: Warn User
mod.description: Send a warning to this user

mod.label: Warn User For Message
mod.description: Send a warning to this user about their message

mod.label: Timeout User
mod.description: Time this user out for 10 minutes

mod.label: Purge Channel
mod.description: Delete all messages in the channel since this one

mod.label: Spam Cleanup
mod.description: Delete this user's recent messages with this content
